title: Jordan lui kamah ka ding a
lyrics:
Jordan lui kamah ka ding a,
Nghakhlel takin ka thlir;
Kanan ram nuam lam chu ka thlir,
Ka chatuan hmun tur chu.

Nakinah chu ram nuamah kan chawl ang,
Lui ral lehlam mawi takah chuanin;
Beramno fakin hla mawi tak chu kan sa ang,
Isua hnena cheng reng turin.

Chu ram mawi tak chungah chuanin,
Chatuan eng chu a awm;
Kan Lalpa Isuan ro a rel,
Thimna a awm tawh lo.

Eng tikah nge ka thlen ve ang,
Chu ram mawi leh nuam chu;
Kan Pa hmel duhawm leh lawmawm,
Eng tik nge ka hmuh ang?

Ka rilru lawmin a lo khat,
Leiah ka cheng rei lo'ng;
Jordan tuipui fawn vel mah se,
Him takin ka kai ang.
